pullrequest.title: Fix #2605: kinematic loops for DART 6.7 and later

content.raw:
Yeah, I guess @pchorak mentioned that in the description of pull request #2756 that dantzig fails for this world, but we never filed an issue about it. He did report a [dantzig solver issue upstream](https://github.com/dartsim/dart/issues/892) for a slightly different model, but that problem may be related to invalid contact point generation rather than the LCP solver.

I'll make an issue in our issue tracker for that, but it is not a new failure.
content.html:
Yeah, I guess @pchorak mentioned that in the description of pull request #2756 that dantzig fails for this world, but we never filed an issue about it. He did report a dantzig solver issue upstream for a slightly different model, but that problem may be related to invalid contact point generation rather than the LCP solver.

I'll make an issue in our issue tracker for that, but it is not a new failure.
